class.name: AwsAssumeRole
class.description: A build feature for assuming an AWS role to be used during the build

function.name: awsAssumeRole
function.description: Assumes an AWS role for use during the build

param.name: awsrole.roleArn
param.description: AWS ARN of the role to assume

param.name: awsrole.externalId
param.description: The external ID used when requesting the role session

param.name: awsrole.sessionName
param.description: The session name used when requesting the role session

param.name: awsrole.sessionTags
param.description: Tags applied to the assumed session
